config.process:
10 sliding window size (in epochs) min unit of ROT (sec/min) 120 AATR calculation interval (in epochs) 10 minimum arc length threshold (in epochs) 350000 height of the ionospheric layer (in meters) 0 type of mapping function used for VTEC conversion (0=SLM, 1=MSLM, 2=F_K, 3=Ou, 4=Fanselow) 7 cut-off satellite elevation(deg)
true use phase obs (true/false) true estimate trop param (true/false) true estimate iono param (true/false) false use doppler obs (true/false) saastamoinen trop model 30 initial sigma of coordinate 10 initial sigma of velocity 10 initial sigma of ztd 30 initial sigma of ambiguity 10 initial sigma of Galileo isb/ifb 10 initial sigma of GLONASS isb/ifb 10 initial sigma of BDS isb/ifb 100 initial sigma of slant iono RAW_ALL obs comb type (IONO_FREE/RAW_ALL) 3 posterior residual threshold est coordinate constraint method (EST/FIX/KIN/SIMU_KIN) false kinematic mode (true/false) 5 min satellite number SINEL weigh model of obs true whether to correct BDS codeBias (true/false) default cycle slip detect method 2 frequency number
config.ambiguity: NO ambiguity fixed mode (NO/SEARCH) UPD upd mode YES part_fix (YES/NO) 4 threshold in partial ambiguity fixing 2.0 threshold in LAMBDA method YES set_refsat (YES/NO) 1 minimum common time/amb1onds extra widelane setting, alpha&maxdev(Confidence interval parameter), maxsig(maximum sigma) widelane setting, option: alpha&maxdev(Confidence interval parameter), maxsig(maximum sigma) narrowlane setting, option: alpha&maxdev(Confidence interval parameter), maxsig(maximum sigma)
